mapper.select: SELECT t.TASK_ID_ taskId, t.USER_ID_ taskAssigin, a.CREATE_TIME_ startTime, a.PROC_INST_ID_ processId, a.NAME_ taskName, a.SUSPENSION_STATE_ state, a.`PRIORITY_` AS priority FROM ( SELECT art.ID_ AS TASK_ID_, art.ASSIGNEE_ AS USER_ID_ FROM act_ru_task art WHERE art.ID_ IS NOT NULL AND art.ASSIGNEE_ IS NOT NULL AND art.ASSIGNEE_ = #{userId} UNION SELECT TASK_ID_, USER_ID_ FROM ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I, ACT_RU_TASK T WHERE TASK_ID_ IS NOT NULL AND USER_ID_ IS NOT NULL AND I.TASK_ID_ = T.ID_ AND T.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND TYPE_ = 'candidate' ) t, act_ru_task a WHERE t.TASK_ID_ = a.ID_ AND t.USER_ID_ = #{userId}

select * from (
SELECT taskId, startTime, endTime, processInstanceId, taskName, priority, processDefName, startUserId, applyTime, stopTime, processCategory, processKey, processInstanceName, handerId FROM ( SELECT aht.ID_ AS taskId, aht.START_TIME_ AS startTime, aht.END_TIME_ AS endTime, aht.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, aht.NAME_ AS taskName, aht.PRIORITY_ AS priority, arp.NAME_ AS processDefName, ahp.START_USER_ID_ AS startUserId, ahp.START_TIME_ AS applyTime, ahp.END_TIME_ AS stopTime, arp.CATEGORY_ as processCategory, arp.KEY_ as processKey, ahp.NAME_ as processInstanceName, aht.ASSIGNEE_ as handerId FROM act_hi_taskinst aht LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef arp ON aht.PROC_DEF_ID_ = arp.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst ahp ON ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ = aht.PROC_INST_ID_ and aht.END_TIME_ is not null ) AS totalProcessInstance )t WHERE handerId=#{userId}
